DOC.brief_summary: The objective study evaluate sixty male non-pregnant female patient diagnose acute moderate severe low back pain onset symptom within 30 day . To evaluate functional improvement follow 4-week use in-elastic lumbar sacral orthosis ( LSO ) treatment modality acute low back pain .
DOC.brief_title: A Prospective , Multicenter , Randomized Control Study To Determine Clinical Effectiveness , Patient Wellness Cost Pain Related Care In-Elastic Lumbar Sacral Orthoses Versus Standard Medical Treatment Patients Presenting With Acute Low Back Pain In Primary Care Centers ( The ARREST Study )
DOC.detailed_description: The objective study evaluate sixty male non-pregnant female patient diagnose acute moderate severe low back pain onset symptom within 30 day . To evaluate functional improvement follow 4-week use in-elastic lumbar sacral orthosis ( LSO ) treatment modality acute low back pain .
DOC.criteria: Moderate complete disability ( baseline ODI score 21 80 percent ) Pregnant patient Patients consider pregnancy Patients investigational device drug study Patients unwilling return follow Patients unwilling provide access medical claim associate pain management .
